aura.devWindowSeconds.description: Struggle detection window in seconds when running the extension in Development mode

aura.retryAttemptThreshold.description: Number of similar edit attempts required to trigger a struggle signal

aura.maxSnippetChars.description: Maximum number of characters to capture for a snippet around the edit location

aura.showCodeLens.description: Show CodeLens actions for the latest lesson

aura.showHover.description: Show hover tooltip excerpt near the struggle location

aura.sendCodeSnippet.description: Send a small code snippet to the backend for better recommendations

aura.sendFilePath.description: Send the local file path to the backend (may reveal sensitive paths)

aura.signals.undoRedo.enabled.description: Enable undo/redo pattern detection (detects undo-redo cycling)

aura.signals.timePattern.enabled.description: Enable time pattern detection (detects hesitation and burst-after-pause)

aura.signals.terminal.enabled.description: Enable terminal detection (detects test failures and stack traces)

aura.signals.debug.enabled.description: Enable debug detection (detects breakpoint thrashing and short sessions)

aura.signals.semantic.enabled.description: Enable semantic detection (detects structural vs cosmetic changes). Disabled by default due to higher overhead.

aura.signals.editPattern.enabled.description: Enable edit pattern detection (legacy Levenshtein-based retry detection)

aura.aggregation.triggerThreshold.description: Combined signal score threshold to trigger struggle detection (0-1)

aura.aggregation.weights.undoRedo.description: Weight for undo/redo signal in aggregation

aura.aggregation.weights.timePattern.description: Weight for time pattern signal in aggregation

aura.aggregation.weights.terminal.description: Weight for terminal signal in aggregation

aura.aggregation.weights.debug.description: Weight for debug signal in aggregation

aura.aggregation.weights.semantic.description: Weight for semantic signal in aggregation

aura.aggregation.weights.editPattern.description: Weight for edit pattern (legacy) signal in aggregation

scripts.test: npm run compile && if [ -f ./node_modules/@vscode/test-electron/out/runTest.js ]; then node ./node_modules/@vscode/test-electron/out/runTest.js; else echo 'Test runner not available, skipping tests'; fi
